sentences.sentence: Heddle distribution can be programmed on up to 28 frames.
sentences.translation: 综片分布能够通过编程达到28架。

sentences.sentence: The differences in the power spectrum for estimating the quality of heddle frame are found.
sentences.translation: 讨论了评价综框质量的能量谱的差异。

sentences.sentence: Five Heddle Weave Wire Cloth, Crimped Wire Mesh, Alloy and so on, each has its own characteristics.
sentences.translation: 五综编织网、磨料网、轧花网、合金网等等，各具特色。
